name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Autonomous Engineer with 10+ years of experience in software development and deployment, specializing in **Java**, **SQL**, **Oracle**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Kubernetes**. Adept in **Containerization** and **CaaS**, with substantial expertise in **Service Inventory**, **Service Provisioning**, and **Catalog Driven Orchestration** within telecom environments. Proven track record of delivering high-performance solutions featuring **NokiaFlowOne**, **xDSL**, **FTTx**, and **IP/MPLS** technologies, while leveraging **Virtualization** techniques to enhance operational efficiency.

Demonstrated ability to lead agile teams in the development of enterprise platforms with a strong focus on compliance and security standards. Skilled in adopting modern technologies including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python** for innovative solutions, experienced in **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI** for full stack development. Passionate about embedding AI/ML capabilities into solutions for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making, with practical experience in MLOps and tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to driving impactful results through robust software engineering practices.
